creator: DLTECH LTD
descriptionHtml:
The app helps Keeper users log in, authenticate and confirm transactions via phone. It works as an authenticator for websites and dApps in the Waves ecosystem.

Keeper can connect to:
🔷 web apps or websites
🔷 mobile apps
🔷 desktop apps

You are not bound by a particular device or account. Just use the QR code authorization with your phone’s camera and connect to any app on desktop, laptop, tablet, or other phone. Connect to different services using multiple accounts without the need to log in each time.

Waves services are now available on every possible platform in their full functionality, while maintaining the highest level of security with Keeper. All the seed phrases and private keys are stored locally and never get exposed.

A convenient solution for those who would like to take advantage of the browser version of Keeper on the go. The entire Waves ecosystem is now at your fingertips.

Enjoy Keeper functionality:
🔷 Connect to sites and dApps with ease and multiple accounts at a time
🔷 Sign transactions via phone
🔷 View your token balance and device-specific transaction history
🔷 No risk of compromising your security with private keys stored locally
descriptionShort: Keeper is an application for the Waves blockchain and Waves-powered web services

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Fixed password creation
- Fix small bug's
